definition[0]: a small container made of paper or plastic with a lid, in which food is bought or stored
definition[1]: an open container that is usually round, used for washing, storing things in etc
definition[2]: the amount of liquid, food etc that a tub can contain
example[3]: We ate a tub of ice cream.
definition[3]: a large container in which you sit to wash yourself
example[4]: I had a long soak in the tub.
definition[4]: an old boat that travels slowly
